text: Sore de kare-ra wa,(mata) kare (yusufu) no moto ni yattekite itta. `Moshiagemasu. Sainan (kikin) ga watashi-tachi to ichizoku no mono ni furikakattanode, hon'no somatsuna shina o motte san irimashita. Masume o jubun ni shite, watashi-tachi ni hodokoshite kudasai. Hontoni arra wa hodokoshi o ataeru mono o mukuwa remasu
